summary: A quick and dirty texture mod for the vanilla steel arrows. The default version looked too much like an ornate silver quiver and the red fletching looked out of place to me. This texture aims to bring both the arrows and quiver back in line with the rest of the steel weapons.
descriptionHtml:
A quick and dirty texture mod for the vanilla steel arrows. The default version looked too much like an ornate silver quiver and the red fletching looked out of place to me. This texture aims to bring both the arrows and quiver back in line with the rest of the steel weapons.

[list]
[*] Darker steel fittings around the throat and seat of the quiver

[*] Re-coloured fletching to make the arrows look more like they belong in the vanilla Steel set

[*] No changes made to the vanilla leather body of the quiver

[*] This is not an HD texture replacer, just a quick change to the original texture to amend the eyesore that was vanilla steel arrows. 
[/list]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Install by using the Mod Manager download or by un-zipping and placing the textures folder into \\Skyrim\\Data\\ and enjoy

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Textures extracted with [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=247]BSAopt[/url]

Edited using Photoshop with [url=http://developer.nvidia.com/nvidia-texture-tools-adobe-photoshop]Nvidias Photoshop tools[/url]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

[b]NOTE:[/b] I accidentally took my example screens while using Madcat221\'s [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5164]Proper Length Arrows[/url] I will up new screens illustrating what it looks like on vanilla meshes soon.
author: Reisz
